scope.title: Icon
scope.description: The Agriculture Design System supports the use of universal system icons. The icon component is used to apply our set of universal icons to more complex components of the system.

data.title: Icon
data.description: The Agriculture Design System supports the use of universal system icons. The icon component is used to apply our set of universal icons to more complex components of the system.
